function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Crowding in public housing accelerating the spread of the virus","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Reassessing housing unit size to avoid crowding and facilitate social distancing","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems for improved air quality, spatial analysis tools for housing design","People":"Residents of public housing","Owner":"Urban planners and housing developers"},{"Description":"Lack of natural ventilation in apartment buildings","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Designing apartment buildings with access to natural ventilation and improved indoor air quality","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, sensors for air quality monitoring","People":"Residents in apartment buildings","Owner":"Architects and building developers"},{"Description":"Shift from physical to virtual environments for safe interactions","Impact":"Increased reliance on technology for daily interactions","Mitigation":"Ensuring robust and secure information technology infrastructure for virtual interactions","Technologies":"Secure virtual meeting platforms, cybersecurity measures","People":"General population","Owner":"IT companies and technology infrastructure providers"}]}
